resources.string:
左上にあるのはあなたのMonacoinアドレスです。このアドレスを送金者に知らせることで、Monacoinを受け取れます。 タップして変更。

右のQRコードはあなたのMonacoinアドレスのものです。 タップして拡大表示。

中央には財布の残高が表示されます。 現地通貨での価値も表示されます。 残高をタップして、ほかの通貨での価値を表示。通貨をタップしてデフォルトの通貨に設定。

画面の下部には取引履歴が表示されます。 認証待ちの取引は認証されるまで灰色で表示されます。 タップしてアドレスをアドレス帳に追加 左にスワイプで入金履歴、右にスワイプで送金履歴を表示。

アクションバーにあるボタンで送金とリクエストができます。 More options are available in the options menu.

Using this dialog, you can request coins from another person (who should already have installed Monacoin Wallet).

First, you can enter an amount of Monacoins to request.

Then, you either have the generated QR code scanned by the other person. Or, you can send your request to a remote person with the share button in the action bar. The other person will have to click the Monacoin URL.

Either way, the other person will be presented a dialog for sending coins with all fields pre-populated. If she accepts, all she needs to do is sending the payment.

You have initiated the process of sending coins. You came here either through the main screen or by clicking on a Monacoin URL in your mobile browser.

First, you enter the Monacoin address to pay to. The address will autocomplete from known entries in your address book. You can also scan QR codes with Monacoin addresses or Monacoin requests by pressing the QR button in the action bar.

Next, you can see how many Monacoins you can spend at the moment. Any difference to the balance from the main screen is still unconfirmed and can thus not yet be spent.

Last, you enter the amount to pay.

You can enter a payment while being offline. It will be sent on next restart of Monacoin Wallet. If you want a payment to be processed as fast as possible, make sure you are well connected (i.e. on a WLAN).

Note: Payments are irreversible! Always check the receiving address.

Important safety notes:

Monacoins are stored on the device. If you lose it, you\'ll lose your Monacoins.

This means you need to back up your wallet! Use the in-app backup facility for this, rather than a third party backup app. Keep your backup safe and remember the password.

Before uninstalling (or clearing app data/wiping your device), transfer your Monacoins to another wallet. Remaining Monacoins will be lost.

Payments are irreversible. If you send your Monacoins into the void, there is almost no way to get them back.

Keep your mobile device safe! Do not root your device. Do only install apps you fully trust. Malicious apps could be trying to steal your wallet.

Keep the risk low! Only use with small amounts for day use.
